tweets.text:
In a joint message, @TonyJuniper from @NaturalEngland,
@EmmaHowardBoyd from @EnvAgency and @williamrworsley from @ForestryEngland have declared that this must be the year we ramp up action on climate change and #NatureRecovery.

#TogetherForOurPlanet
https://t.co/imv3CfNn6I

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical
domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

tweets.text:
Read this important piece from @TonyJuniper from  @NaturalEngland
@EmmaHowardBoyd from @EnvAgency @williamrworsley from @ForestryEngland 
About why we have to use this opportunity to lead the way in protecting the natural world & our environment  üíö
https://t.co/Sv3AXjBzNy

Meanwhile back in the real world the @EnvAgency have applied for an abstraction licence.

Why? To pump water from the aquifer into a river that is, wait for it, wait for it, over abstracted by the water industry.  You can't make this sh*t up.

PS, the river is also full of it. https://t.co/1xdVY2Ozhc https://t.co/uN3GBq4qiL

tweets.text:
This is our 2nd story in ONE week of cats being rescued by @gizmos_legacy. 
Follow the link to find out how one of our volunteers rescued George from the back of a caged council van 
The sooner @JamesDalyMP  gets #GizmosLaw through Parliament the better 

https://t.co/aQMEqJOc9S https://t.co/56oDgckVDt

Quagga mussels are an invasive non-native species and have recently been found in the #RiverTrent.

They can spread rapidly and block pipes.

Help us prevent this: check, clean and dry your equipment and footwear after spending time around watercourses. 
https://t.co/yvjXsvp14v https://t.co/xuYv9GXUrF
